201403.n: Social Media and Search Marketing Analytics

201503.n: Social Media and Search Marketing Analytics

201703.n: Social Media and Search Marketing Analytics

catList: The course covers topics like search marketing, social media marketing, mobile advertising, big data marketing, and marketing with user generated content. Data analysis using Excel and some free software tools would be a major component of this course.

The course covers a practical method to create viral content (STEPPS), components of social influence (influentials, social networks), social media analytics tools such as textual mining and effects of social media on consumers. Several cases would be a major component of this course.
